items.title: Crafting
items.content: Craft items using appropriate tools. You can craft items worth 5 gp per day. The cost of materials is half the item's price.
items.example: Forging a sword, brewing potions, crafting jewelry

items.title: Practicing a Profession
items.content: Earn money by working a job. Make an ability check using the appropriate skill or tool. You earn money based on your result.
items.example: Working as a blacksmith, performing at taverns, offering mercenary services

items.title: Equipment Customization
items.content: Modify weapons and armor over time using crafting or magical enhancement. Provides unique personalization options and mechanical benefits.

items.title: Trade and Crafting Competitions
items.content: Participate in contests that pit you against local artisans or rival groups for rare materials or exclusive recipes. Engenders friendly rivalry and adds fun, side-challenge layers to non-adventuring days.
